name: WordPress Admin UI Reference Guide
author: Eugene Pyvovarov

sections.description:
Reference guide for all admin UI elements in WordPress admin. Must-have for all plugins developers.

  • Titles & icons
  • Block Widget, layout
  • Draggable block widgets
  • Tables
  • Pagers
  • Tabs
  • Forms
  • Buttons, links, images
  • Content sliders
  • Lightbox windows

For now not all of theese are described, but I’m working hard on this.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wordpress-admin-ui-reference-guide to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.5.2

  • added info about tabs

0.5

  • Initial version of plugin
